description: From a partition of the integers.
references: H. N. Shapiro, A combinatorial problem in additive number theory, pp. 265-282 of Number Theory Carbondale 1979, Lect. Notes Math. 751 (1982).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
